title: Diff. eq. no context with slope field part - c

content.description: Consider the differential equation dy/dx = x+1/y.
content.question: Find the particular solution y=f(x) to the given differential equation with the initial condition f(0)=-2.

frqParts.text: Find the particular solution y=f(x) to the given differential equation with the initial condition f(0)=-2.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
